blog_author.description: This variable contains blog author information for blog author listing pages. It can be used to create conditional logic to >render markup for blog author listings ({% if blog_author %}).

content.blog_post_author.description: This variable contains individual blog post author information for a given post.

content.comment_count.description: The number of comments for the current blog post.

content.comment_list.description: A list of the comments for the current blog post.

content.featured_image.description: The source url of the featured image, selected when the blog was published.

content.featured_image_alt_text.description: The alt text of the featured image.

content.next_post.description: Information about the next post, if one exists.

content.previous_post.description: Information about the previous post, if one exists.

content.post_body.description: The body of the blog post.

content.post_list_content.description: The body blog post content, modified for the listing page. The final output is affected by summary settings in Settings > Website > Blog. If featured images are enabled in settings, this variable will remove any images above the read more separator automatically.

content.post_summary.description: The blog post summary. This content is determined by the read more separator in the blog editor.

content.post_list_summary_featured_image.description: The featured image of post summaries to be used in listing templates. This variable is affected by the settings in Settings > Website > Blog.

content.publish_date_localized.description: A string representing the date/time when the blog post was published, formatted according to the blog's language and date formatting settings.

current_page_num.description: The integer index of the current page of blog posts in the view.

last_page_num.description: The integer index of the last page of blog posts in the view.

next_page_num.description: The integer index of the next page of blog posts in the view.

simple_list_page.description: A boolean to indicate whether the requested page is the 'all posts' page containing links to all blog posts.

content.topic_list.description: Can be used to render markup for a topic listing by looping through it. {% for topic in content.topic_list %} The items within contain the properties: name and slug.

contents.description: Contents is a sequence of your blog posts that is iterated through using a for loop.

group.description: The dictionary containing variables that pertain to an entire blog.

archive_list_page.description: Returns true if page is a blog archive page. Ex: https://www.example.com/blog/archive/2020/02 would return true.
